original_title: Bending The Lens: 20 Years of the London Lesbian Film Festival
overview: This film documents the inception, growth and impact of the longest running ‘lesbian’ film festival in North America by exploring the challenges and successes of the LLFF through interviews with Reeling Spinsters past and present and film festival attendees.
tagline: 20 years of controversy, camaraderie and celebration of lesbian film
title: Bending The Lens: 20 Years of the London Lesbian Film Festival
